short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: You need a peoplefone account and a valid subscription for the softphone.
short.de: Sie benötigen ein peoplefone Konto und ein gültiges Softphone Abonnement.
short.fr: Vous avez besoin d'un compte peoplefone et d'un abonnement valide pour le softphone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension has to be used in addition to the peoplefone Softphone.

The main two features are:
- recognize telephone numbers on websites and by clicking them to establish a call from your peoplefone softphone.
- notify incoming or outgoing calls and by clicking the notification to bring you directly to the peoplefone Softphone Tab.
